label: Preferred Term Column
description: verbatim adverse event text variable name

label: Filters columns
description: An optional list of specifications for filters. Each filter is a nested, named list (containing the filter value column: 'value_col' and associated label: 'label') within the larger list.

label: Details columns
description: An optional list of specifications for details listing.  Each column to be added to details listing is a nested, named list (containing the variable name: "value_col" and associated label: "label") within the larger list.
